bugs.summary: [Presentation WebAPI] Remove "using namespace" from dom/presentation cpp files
js::jit::AbortReason and js::gc::AbortReason do no play nice in very-unified builds
handle overflow hidden scrollbars and related with pinch zooming
Lone CR causes previous whitespace to get collapsed.
[macOS] Reflow zoom lags behind by user interaction (profile showing lots of time in font code)
SVG helper classes don't need to inherit nsISupports
Introduce eUSE_TARGET and use it rather than listing all elements that can be use targets
[Wayland] Remove DMABuf backend from SW compositor
Crash in [@ OOM | large | mozalloc_abort | moz_xmalloc | mozilla::CacheAwareZipReader::PutBufferIntoCache]
delete a bunch of duplicate, unnecessary code from xptcall implementations
Show suggestions for the empty query when in search mode
Store form history source from search access points
Sync more preferences in Privacy & Security
Use llvm-rc.exe instead of rc.exe when available
Separate visual interactions on Credit Card Autofill for A/B testing
